trans-unit.source: A container timeline that provides object and property targeting information for its child animations.
trans-unit.target: 容器時間表，提供物件和目標為其子動畫資訊的屬性。

trans-unit.source: ## Interactively Controlling Storyboards A controllable storyboard can pause, resume, seek, stop, and be removed.
trans-unit.target: ##以互動方式控制分鏡腳本可控制的分鏡腳本可以暫停、 繼續、 搜尋、 停止和移除。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in markup, you specify the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> object that creates it; for an example, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要讓分鏡腳本可控制在標記中，您指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>物件，會建立; 如需範例，請參閱[How to︰ 使用事件觸發程序來控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓分鏡腳本可控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法並指定`true`使其可控制。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱[如何︰ 控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Data Binding and Animating Timelines Most timeline properties can be data bound or animated; however, because of the way the timing system works, data bound or animated timelines do not behave like other data bound or animated objects.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結和動畫最砸下大筆花費的時間軸屬性可以是資料繫結或以動畫顯示。不過，由於計時系統的運作的方式，繫結或動畫時間軸行為不像其他資料的資料繫結，或建立動畫的物件。

trans-unit.source: To understand their behavior, it helps to understand what it means to activate a timeline.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解其行為，它有助於了解啟用時間軸的意義。

trans-unit.source: When a timeline is activated, copies are made of the timeline and its child timelines.
trans-unit.target: 啟動的時間軸時，會在時間軸和子時刻表製作複本。

trans-unit.source: These copies are frozen (made read-only) and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created from them.
trans-unit.target: 這些複本會凍結 （對唯讀） 和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>從中建立物件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks do the actual work of animating the targeted properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些時鐘會執行動畫目標的屬性的實際工作。

trans-unit.source: If a timeline is data bound or animated, a snapshot of its current values is made when its clock is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料繫結或動畫效果，其目前值的快照集建立時做時鐘時間表。

trans-unit.source: Even though the original timeline might continue to change, its clock does not.
trans-unit.target: 即使原始時間軸可能繼續變更，其時鐘卻不符合。

trans-unit.source: For a timeline to reflect data binding or animation changes, its clock must be re-created.
trans-unit.target: 時間表反映資料繫結或動畫變更其時鐘必須重新建立。

trans-unit.source: Clocks are not re-created for you automatically.
trans-unit.target: 時鐘不會重新建立為您自動。

trans-unit.source: The following are several ways to apply timeline changes: - If the timeline is or belongs to a Storyboard, you can make it reflect changes by reapplying its storyboard using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是幾種方式可以套用時間軸變更:-如果時間軸或屬於分鏡腳本，您可以將它重新套用其分鏡腳本使用反映變更<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: This has the side effect of also restarting the animation.
trans-unit.target: 這有副作用，也重新啟動動畫。

trans-unit.source: In code, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A> method to advance the storyboard back to its previous position.
trans-unit.target: 在程式碼中，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A>前進分鏡腳本方法回它先前的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If you applied an animation directly to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> method, call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> method again and pass it the animation that has been modified.
trans-unit.target: -如果您動畫直接套用到屬性，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>方法，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>方法一次，並將它傳遞已修改的動畫。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If you are working directly at the clock level, create and apply a new set of clocks and use them to replace the previous set of created clocks.
trans-unit.target: -如果您正在直接在時鐘層級，建立和套用一組新的時鐘和使用它們來取代先前組建立的時鐘。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a data bound animation, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) .
trans-unit.target: 如範例的資料繫結動畫，請參閱 <<c0> [ 金鑰曲線動畫範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.target: 適用於與此相關聯的動畫<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>至其目標並加以初始化。

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets and initiates them.
trans-unit.target: 適用於與此相關聯的動畫<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>至其目標並加以初始化。

trans-unit.target: 如果目標的屬性已有動畫效果，它們就會取代使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>遞移式行為。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Storyboards started with this method cannot be paused, resumed, or otherwise interactively controlled after they are started.
trans-unit.target: 無法暫停、 繼續，或其他互動方式控制會在啟動之後開始使用這個方法的分鏡腳本。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從此分鏡腳本，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: 從 分鏡腳本的觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: An object contained within the same name scope as the targets of this storyboard's animations.
trans-unit.target: 做為這個分鏡腳本動畫目標相同的名稱範圍內包含的物件。

trans-unit.target: 適用於與此相關聯的動畫<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>至其目標並加以初始化。

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: 從 分鏡腳本的觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.target: 做為這個分鏡腳本動畫目標相同的名稱範圍內包含的物件。

trans-unit.source: Animations without a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*> are applied to `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: 動畫沒有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>套用至`containingObject`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets and initiates them.
trans-unit.target: 適用於與此相關聯的動畫<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>至其目標並加以初始化。

trans-unit.source: If the targeted properties are already animated, they are replaced using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> handoff behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標的屬性已有動畫效果，它們就會取代使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>遞移式行為。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must specify the same `containingObject` when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: 若要以互動方式控制這個分鏡腳本，您必須指定相同`containingObject`呼叫互動式方法用來呼叫這個方法時，開始分鏡腳本時<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>分鏡腳本和它所包含的任何時間軸會建立物件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: 會與儲存在這些時鐘`containingObject`。

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: 從 分鏡腳本的觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: An object contained within the same name scope as the targets of this storyboard's animations.
trans-unit.target: 做為這個分鏡腳本動畫目標相同的名稱範圍內包含的物件。

trans-unit.source: Animations without a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*> are applied to `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: 動畫沒有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>套用至`containingObject`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.TargetName*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the storyboard should be interactively controllable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果腳本應該要以互動方式控制。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets and initiates them, using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 適用於與此相關聯的動畫<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>至其目標和起始，使用指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: 當您將套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>，任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>之前與該屬性相關聯的物件會繼續耗用系統資源; 計時系統不會自動移除這些時鐘。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免發生效能問題，當您套用大量使用時鐘<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>，在它們完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: 有幾種方式移除時鐘。

trans-unit.source: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: -若要從屬性移除所有時鐘，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>動畫物件的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: 指定的第一個參數，要繪製之屬性和`null`做為第二個。

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: 這會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -若要移除<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>的時鐘，清單中使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>來擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>，然後呼叫此<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>方法的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>特定

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>時鐘的事件處理常式。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>;<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>子時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>如果有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會呼叫事件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 這是主要的動畫長的存留期的物件上的問題。

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收物件時，也會中斷其時鐘和記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Applies the animations associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to their targets and initiates them, using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 適用於與此相關聯的動畫<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>至其目標和起始，使用指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the targeted properties are already animated, they are replaced using the specified handoff behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標的屬性已有動畫效果，它們就會取代使用指定的遞移式行為。

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must specify the same `containingObject` when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: 若要以互動方式控制這個分鏡腳本，您必須指定相同`containingObject`呼叫互動式方法用來呼叫這個方法時，開始分鏡腳本時<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>分鏡腳本和它所包含的任何時間軸會建立物件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are stored with `containingObject`.
trans-unit.target: 會與儲存在這些時鐘`containingObject`。

trans-unit.source: Beginning a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> events.
trans-unit.target: 從 分鏡腳本的觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: 撰寫 HandoffBehavior 時使用您套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>，任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>之前與該屬性相關聯的物件會繼續耗用系統資源; 計時系統不會自動移除這些時鐘。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免發生效能問題，當您套用大量使用時鐘<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>，在它們完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: 有幾種方式移除時鐘。

trans-unit.source: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: -若要從屬性移除所有時鐘，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>動畫物件的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: 指定的第一個參數，要繪製之屬性和`null`做為第二個。

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: 這會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -若要移除<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>的時鐘，清單中使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>來擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>，然後呼叫此<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>方法的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>特定

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>時鐘的事件處理常式。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>;<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>子時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>如果有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會呼叫事件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 這是主要的動畫長的存留期的物件上的問題。

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收物件時，也會中斷其時鐘和記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>如果有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會呼叫事件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 這是主要的動畫長的存留期的物件上的問題。

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收物件時，也會中斷其時鐘和記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To interactively control this storyboard, you must use the same `containingObject` parameter when calling the interactive methods that you used to begin the storyboard When this method is called, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created for the storyboard and any timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: 若要以互動方式控制這個分鏡腳本，您必須使用相同`containingObject`參數呼叫互動式方法用來呼叫這個方法時，開始分鏡腳本時<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>物件建立分鏡腳本和它所包含的任何砸下大筆花費。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: 撰寫 HandoffBehavior 時使用您套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>，任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>之前與該屬性相關聯的物件會繼續耗用系統資源; 計時系統不會自動移除這些時鐘。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免發生效能問題，當您套用大量使用時鐘<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>，在它們完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> that was created for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>所建立之此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>

trans-unit.source: The current global speed, or 0 if the clock is stopped.
trans-unit.target: 目前的全域速度或 0，如果時鐘已停止。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> that was created for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>所建立之此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed*>

trans-unit.source: A clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A> speed is the rate at which its time is currently progressing, compared to real-world time.
trans-unit.target: 時鐘的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>速度是在其目前行進的速率，與實際時間相比較。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To use this method to retrieve information about a storyboard's clock, the storyboard must be controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法來擷取分鏡腳本的時鐘的相關資訊，必須可控制分鏡腳本。

trans-unit.source: To make a storyboard controllable in code, you must use the appropriate overload of the storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method and specify `true` to make it controllable.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓分鏡腳本可控制在程式碼中，您必須使用分鏡腳本的適當多載<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法並指定`true`使其可控制。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱[如何︰ 控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A clock's first iteration has a value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 時鐘的第一個反覆項目有值為 1。

trans-unit.source: If this storyboard has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A> setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個分鏡腳本<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>設定`true`，完整的反覆項目是由正向反向組所組成，不只是下列其中一種區段。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this clock's timeline has an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A> setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個時鐘時間表具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>設定`true`，完整的反覆項目是由正向反向組所組成，不只是下列其中一種區段。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of its current iteration, seeking a clock returns its current iteration to 1.
trans-unit.target: 其目前的反覆項目，不論搜尋時鐘傳回其目前的反覆項目設為 1。

trans-unit.source: Restarting a clock also returns its current iteration to 1.
trans-unit.target: 重新啟動時鐘也會傳回其目前的反覆項目設為 1。
